root.title: stora close complet papyru takeov
root.body: sweden stora kopparberg bergslag ab skp st sai now acquir 90 pct share rival pulp paper maker papyru ab thu pass threshold compulsorili bui rest compani remain sharehold later month sell share stora compani sai statement stora announc last septemb acquir papyru price 5.8 billion crown thu form europ second largest forest group london base reed intern plc reed l
